entry.title: Installing Home Assistant on Proxmox
entry.summary: Login to the console of your proxmox server Run the below command to execute a community maintained script that will handle the creation and configuration of the vm for you bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/vm/haos-vm.sh)" Follow on screen prompts
